statements: UPDATE tutorials SET title='Updated Title', author='John Doe' WHERE tutorial_id=1;
UPDATE tutorials SET category='Updated Category', content='Updated Content' WHERE tutorial_id=2;
UPDATE tutorials SET title='Advanced SQL Techniques', category='Database', content='In this tutorial, we will learn advanced SQL techniques.', author='John Doe' WHERE tutorial_id=1;
UPDATE tutorials SET author='Jane Smith', category='Programming', created_at='2022-01-25 10:00:00' WHERE title='Python Basics';
UPDATE tutorials SET tutorial_title='Updated Title 1', tutorial_description='Updated Description 1' WHERE tutorial_id=1;
UPDATE guides SET guide_title='Updated Guide', guide_rating=4, guide_url='https://updated-url.com' WHERE guide_id=2;
UPDATE tutorials SET tutorial_title='New Title', tutorial_url='https://newurl.com' WHERE tutorial_id=1;
UPDATE guides SET guide_rating=5, guide_category='New Category' WHERE guide_id=3;
UPDATE tutorials SET tutorial_title='New Title', tutorial_description='Updated description' WHERE tutorial_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='new_email@example.com', created_at='2022-09-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE tutorials SET tutorial_title = 'New Title', tutorial_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE tutorial_id = 1;
UPDATE progress SET completed = TRUE, progress_percent = 100 WHERE tutorial_id = 5 AND user_id = 3;
UPDATE tutorials SET title = 'New Title', content = 'Updated content' WHERE tutorial_id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET expertise_area = 'New Area' WHERE author_id = 3;
UPDATE tutorials SET author = 'John Doe', content = 'Updated content' WHERE tutorial_id = 1;
UPDATE authors SET expertise_area = 'Software Development' WHERE author_id = 2;
UPDATE tutorials SET author = 'John Doe' WHERE tutorial_id = '42705701-6a9f-4f18-8cb1-1c07c8148cf7';
UPDATE steps SET duration = '1 hour' WHERE step_id = 3;

UPDATE steps SET description = 'Updated description', duration = '1 hour' WHERE tutorial_id = '55e5ad3c-1e1b-4b79-82bb-8c9b7b0a8441' AND step_number = 2;
